name: GlucoseToleranceTestResults
title: Glucose Tolerance Test Results
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Lists any LOINC code that could represent a Glucose Tolerance Test result),(Data Element Scope: Glucose Tolerance Test results),(Inclusion Criteria: All results indicated for glucose tolerance testing),(Exclusion Criteria: Glucose tolerance test results that are indicated as prior to ingestion of glucose, gestational panels, and codes that represent glucose tolerance interpretation and narrative notes.)
